casebody.data:
CLEVELAND METRO. BAR ASSN.
v.
MOODY 2017-1738 Supreme Court of Ohio. January 2, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

DISCIPLINARY CASES

On Certified Report by the Board of Professional Conduct, No. 2017-008. Steven Jerome Moody, Attorney Registration No. 0074731, last known address in Cleveland, Ohio, found in contempt for failure to surrender his attorney-registration card and failure to file an affidavit of compliance on or before November 13, 2018.
